price: 归信的人们啊！你们要敬畏安拉，要和诚实的人在一起。
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَكُونُواْ مَعَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ittaqū al-laha wakūnū maʿa al-ṣādiqīna
